name: Space Cleaner
description:
Space Cleaner is a game about small robot on a spaceship. Its task is to collect trash cubes and transfer them to the airlock where they will be thrown into space.

How to play:
  • Transfer trash cubes to the airlock.
  • You will lose if there will be more than 3 trash cubes on one spot.
  • While the airlock is closed you can organise trash cubes to transfer them faster when it will open.
  • Do not get smashed by falling trash cubes.
  • Do not get crushed by the gate.
  • Do not get trapped inside the airlock.
  • Lights and sound alarm indicate when the airlock will close/open.
  • Once every 30 seconds you can use your special power to destroy surrounding trash cubes.
  • Have fun!
Default controls:
  • Arrows/WASD - Movement
  • Space/E - Grabber
  • Left Ctrl/F - Use Power Up
Have fun!
